cab.content: Circulated by the Secretary of- State for India.His Britannic Majesty's Covernmen(This Document is the Property ofSECRET.From Viceroy, 12th March 1918. (Received 2 p.m.)Secret. Weekly report. North-West Frontier quiet everywhere. Baluchistan. For Mari and Khetran rising see separate Army Department telegrams.
